abstract:
Herein we present CONSRANK, a web tool for analyzing, comparing and ranking protein-protein and protein-nucleic acid docking models, based on the conservation of inter-residue contacts and its visualization in 2D and 3D interactive contact maps. Availability: CONSRANK is accessible as a public web tool at https://www.molnac.unisa.it/BioTools/consrank/ CONTACT: romina.oliva@uniparthenope.it.
